title: Remove TFT
body: Can I have the option to remove TFT from my client? I don't play it and I don't like seeing it there.

replies.body: Probably the dumbest thing I've read all day. If you don't play it, don't. If you don't like looking at it, suck it up.

> [{quoted}](name=CV Protostar,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=edZNIqku,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-01-15T04:05:52.324+0000)
>
> Probably the dumbest thing I've read all day. If you don't play it, don't. If you don't like looking at it, suck it up.

Dumbest thing huh? I could say the same to you buddy. Give a reason as to why it should stay for people that don't like it, if not you're just being an asshole and anything you say is invalid.
I agree. I also dont want to see my frineds rank of tft, I care about their actual rank to know who to play with not this irrelevant joke of a sidegame.
